title: Electricity Bill Calculator with Google Sheets
shortDescription: Apps Script + Sheets to log units and calculate bills.

hero.heading: Electricity Bill Calculator
hero.subHeading: Saves meter units to Sheets and computes bills dynamically.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Inputs are saved to Sheets; formulas and tiers compute totals with clear breakdowns for admins.

problemSolution.problem: Manual bill calculations are slow and error-prone.
problemSolution.solution: Automated unit logging and bill computation via Apps Script.

title: Client Form Automation & Dynamic Meeting Scheduler
shortDescription: Automates form capture, notifications, and meeting scheduling in Sheets.

hero.heading: Client Form Automation
hero.subHeading: Capture submissions, notify by email, schedule meetings from Sheets.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Saves submissions into Sheets, notifies the team, and offers dynamic dropdowns for quick scheduling.

problemSolution.problem: Fragmented tools slowed response to incoming leads.
problemSolution.solution: Centralized data in Sheets with scripted notifications and scheduling.

title: Smart Document Generation & Verification System
shortDescription: MERN app for secure file storage and QR-based verification.

hero.heading: Smart Document Verification
hero.subHeading: Generate docs with QR codes and verify them online in real time.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Docs stored in Cloudinary with metadata in MongoDB; QR codes link to verification pages for authenticity checks.

problemSolution.problem: Manual verification was unreliable and slow.
problemSolution.solution: QR-based real-time verification with secure storage and duplicate detection.

benefits.heading: Speed
benefits.description: Instant QR checks reduce wait times.

title: QR Code Document Verification System
shortDescription: MERN platform generating QR codes for PDFs, DOCX, and images.

hero.heading: QR Code Verification
hero.subHeading: Dynamic verification URLs provide secure lookups for documents.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Generates and embeds QR codes in multiple file types and verifies authenticity through Mongo-backed routes.

problemSolution.problem: Hard to verify document authenticity at scale.
problemSolution.solution: Unique QR per document with secure backend for verification.

hero.subHeading: Secure MERN app with dashboards and visual insights.

overview.title: Overview
